scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score with parts, 1 submission letter, 1 biographical note, 1 program note. Notes: Program notes, biographical note, and submission letter are also for Meditation: "Mary's Visit to the Tomb of Christ." Letter is dated "2001" but was received along with other items submitted in 2010. Based on this and the known festival years, 2001 appears to be a typo..
